feed.title: Fort Good Hope - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Fort Good Hope
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 7:56 PM MST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -40.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Fort Good Hope Airport 7:00 PM MST Friday 23 December 2022
Temperature: -40.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 104.2 kPa falling
Humidity: 66 %
Dewpoint: -44.3°C
Wind: 0 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 42.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 42. Wind chill near minus 53. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 32. POP 60%
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness in the afternoon then 60 percent chance of flurries late in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 32. Wind chill minus 53 in the morning and minus 44 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 23 December 2022
